foreignObject.div: Various tasks including PDF compression, image conversion, CSS and JS minification, etc.
Site-specific methods (e.g., for karlsruhe.digital).
Extracts real image sizes and image/background-image links from HTML.
Extracts and modifies links to refer to root.
Utilizes headless browser to save all files locally.
Crawls and extracts all connected internal and external links from given URL.
Optimization for faster processing of blog listings and large blogs.
Consideration of SQL database usage instead of CSV.
Division of code and tasks into more dedicated individual apps.
Collaboration with domestic and international solar panel companies for sustainable energy solutions.
Seeking partners for online analysis of carbon usage per website.
App 200 - Images (Duration: 1 hour 30 minutes)
App 150 - Selenium (Duration: 1 hour)
App 050 - Sitemap Crawl (Duration: 20 minutes)
Approximately 9000 lines of Python code.
Intermediate results stored in CSV files.
Mostly written in Python 3.10.
Shows potential to compress websites by up to 95% without loss of functionality or design.
Code in raw form, lacking comments and refinement.
Establish energy as a teachable cultural practice accessible to all.
Promotes awareness about the link between information and energy consumption.
Developed a method to substantially reduce the power consumption of websites.
Compress websites by up to 95% without compromising functionality or design.
